dcterms:description: The Maslach Burnout Questionnaire is used to measure emotional burnout, personal failure, and nurse depersonalization among healthcare professionals.
dcterms:title: Maslach Burnout Questionnaire

dcterms:description: This dataset provides data for the prevalence of nurse burnout in Iran, compiled through a meta-analysis.
dcterms:title: Data for the prevalence of nurse burnout in Iran (a meta-analysis dataset)

dcterms:description: This dataset examines the prevalence of burnout among nurses during the COVID-19 pandemic and identifies associated risk factors.
dcterms:title: Prevalence of burnout among nurses during the COVID-19 pandemic

dcterms:description: This dataset provides a meta-analysis of the prevalence of burnout syndrome specifically among emergency nurses.
dcterms:title: Prevalence of burnout syndrome in emergency nurses

dcterms:description: This dataset presents a systematic review and meta-analysis of the prevalence of burnout in mental health nurses and related factors.
